thread.title: Slammed by Trump, Amazon’s Jeff Bezos Chooses Silence

author: Laura Stevens
title: Slammed by Trump, Amazon’s Jeff Bezos Chooses Silence
text:
For years, Amazon.com Inc. Chief Executive Jeff Bezos has meticulously crafted his public image, largely shunning the spotlight while carefully making donations that only hint at his political agenda.
But over the past week, the billionaire has been cast into the limelight thanks to a string of attacks by President Donald Trump.

Mr. Bezos’s... RELATED VIDEO Is Amazon Going to Rule the World? Amazon wants to deliver everything you want to your doorstep, anywhere in the world. But the e-commerce giant faces several challenges in its pursuit of a global empire. WSJ's Karan Deep Singh breaks down the basics with the help of an Amazon delivery box.
